description: Built with 3-layer Proflex these are the ultimate soft feel, high stretch, lightweight ski pants. With outstanding breathability, these quiet-to-wear, waterproof ski pants offer freedom to explore steep chutes and mountain faces in all conditions.
name: Rab Khroma Kinetic Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.key: 20D Proflex Stretch Woven Nylon 3-layer Waterproof Technology with flurocarbon-free DWR (149g/m²) HH
